title: Noein: Mou Hitori no Kimi e
title_jp: ノエイン もうひとりの君へ
synopsis: In the near future, a violent battle takes place between the dimension La'cryma (protector of humanity) and the dimension Shangri-La, bent on the annihilation of all space-time. A group known as the Dragon Calvary is dispatched through space and time, searching for the only thing that can stop the invasion: the Dragon's Torque.
